document_data.Summary: [[Sunbright Steelshanks]] and Knucklebones hunt for the [[Rengarth]] tribe, returning the hammer of Dorlas to his father Drigor on the way. They find the tribe with help from a [[Netherese]] mage. [[Sysquemalyn]] frees herself from her prison in a monstrous form and sets out for revenge against [[Polaris]], Sunbright and [[Candlemas]], killing Candlemas just after he solved the crop blight problem. Sunbright becomes shaman by challenging many of the tribe and leads them to a site he saw in a vision. Drigor, after being attacked by Sysquemalyn, finds Sunbright again, after his tribe rejects him for not wanting to fight the elves. Sysquemalyn impersonates the One King to send orcs after the Rengarth and Polaris’s land, and the Rengarth battle with the Cormanthyr after intruding on their territory. Sysquemalyn attacks Polaris during a truce negotiation, but she escapes. Sunbright convinces the Rengarth to side with the elves against orc raiders. Knucklebones is kindapped by Sysquemalyn, but Sunbright saves her.
